item.title: [PwnScape] NPC's [PwnScape]
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

MY FIRST TUT 100% bill / ~~ ghoulkill ~~ / cows1471 (they are ALL me!)

PLEASE DONT FLARE! ITS MY FIRST!!!

Tested Source: Deltascape and my own dev source!

Description: This tutorial will teach you how to make an npc talk [doing it shorter than this :

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,329218.0.html]

BEFORE YOU START GET YOUR NPC ID!!! FIND THAT IN NPC.CGF!!!

Difficulty: well, depends but really 2/10

Requirements:
1. common sense!!!
2. a lil java knowhow!
3. JDK and your server

Files modified -

1.client.java
2.(for adding) autospawn.cgf

STEP 1

Open up client.java and search for this:

wanneshop
You may have to search more than once

you SHOULD come to somthing like this:

}
if(q2 == 1){
NpcDialogue = 27;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

IT MUST BE IN THAT FORMAT(CONVENTIONED AND AWAY FROM THE SIDE) TO WORK!!!

We want to put our “statement” in here

Under a
}

bracket, you want to add your script

to open hit enter so it looks like this:

if(q2 == 1){
NpcDialogue = 27;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
this is where the script will go!

Now we want to add the script

to start we want to open up the script telling which person/monster/npc we want to use.
today for ease im going to add a
"Download the lastest client at “yourwebsite.com!”
DONT WORRY. I WILL EXPLAIN ALL!!!

so to tell it which npc id to use we need to add this:
if (NPCID == YOURNPCIDHERE) {

explained:

This basically tells you that “if” someone clicks on the . then this
{ starts it off. we now need to tell it what to do!

we will now tell the npc/monster/person what to say:

  sendFrame200(4883, 591);

explained
this tells the client where to send the frame on the screen. THIS NEVER CHANGES FOR TALKING TO NPCS!

now we add the next line:
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(YOURNPCIDHERE), 4884);

explained READ EASY TO GO WRONG!!!

In this we need to KEEP the GetNpcName part!!!

DONT CHANGE OR IT CAN COUGH UP ERRORS!!!

The sendFrame126 part tells the client which frame its in.

the 4884); part at the end tells the client where on the page it wants to generate.

The next line is adding text:

  sendFrame126("Download the lastest client at www.yourwebsite.com!!!", 4885);

explained

pretty much the same as before:

the
sendframe126
part tells you where on the screen

4885);
that tells the client where on the screen to put it
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);

wont explain again ^^ same as above!

Now we need to complete the frame being made

we need to add this:

  sendFrame75(YOURNPCIDHERE, 4883);
  sendFrame164(4882);

explained

  sendFrame75(YOURNPCIDHERE, 4883);

that tells the client to make a guys floating head next to text! lol =)

  sendFrame164(4882);

nm else to explain. it just tells the client where to make the frame on your client.

now TO FINISH OFF THE DIALOGE WE NEED TO TELL THE CLIENT TO SEND IT TO THE SCREEN

JUST ADD THIS!:

  NpcDialogueSend = true;

That just tells the client to send it!

thats just about it

just add a
}
to the end and your done!

SO NOW : TO SUMMARISE!

if (NPCID == YOURNPCIDHERE) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(YOURNPCIDHERE), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Download the lastest client at www.yourclient.com!!!”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
sendFrame75(YOURNPCIDHERE, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}

thats what it should all end up as!

so in your client.java it should look like this!

}
if(q2 == 1){
NpcDialogue = 27;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
if (NPCID == YOURNPCIDHERE) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(YOURNPCIDHERE), 4884);
sendFrame126(“Download the lastest client at www.yourclient.com!!!”, 4885);
sendFrame126(“Click here to continue.”, 4886);
sendFrame75(YOURNPCIDHERE, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}

SAVE AND COMPILE!!!

then restart ur server : and it should run!

100% created by me NOOOOOO LEECH!!!

thanks for reading
IF YOU GET ANY ERRORS PM ME AND ILL TRY ME VERY BEST TO HELP!!!

~~ ghoulkill ~~
